name: Ramada Newark / Wilmington

reviews.text: My friends and I stayed here for one night on our way home from a visit to New Jersey. The staff was very helpful. The hotel was clean and comfortable. The complimentary breakfast included eggs and sausage and other basic amenities. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great place to stay!

reviews.text: I am here quite often due to work. It is a good hotel. The staff is very nice and helpful. The hotel is clean, rooms are comfortable, the dining has a good menu. I would stay here if I was up this way and looking for a place to stay with the family. Their breakfast is good but with me being here a lot wish the menu changed. Thanks to the staff..
reviews.title: Good place to lay your head

reviews.text: Room I was given already had someone staying in it. Replacement room had 2 beds but only 1 had sheets on it. Bedspreads looked like the beds had already been sat on. Sheets were threadbare. Blanket looked ancient. Phone kept beeping indicating I had messages although I did not have any messages and it kept waking me up.
reviews.title: Worse stay ever

reviews.text: This is the hotel where other bits of nice hotels go to die. Shabby, dirty, smelly and noisy. They gave someone else the valid key card to my room when I was in it. Drinks from the bar are served in plastic containers just in case you decide to throw them at someone. Oh, and the reviews about the random hairs..... All true.
reviews.title: Grim.

reviews.text: The first check in clerk was not too helpful, past her job on to another clerk. She could not find one of my reservations that was made thru Priceline.com, was told she was new, she also told me I should have called to confirm my reservation. My brother-inlaw work at a hotel ocean front Virginia Beach, took over from there and got everything right. Other then that everything was good for overnight stay and convenience for the location we was visiting.
reviews.title: Convenience for one night

reviews.text: The hotel was a good value for the price. Room was clean and it was nice to have a refrigerator and microwave. The only complaint I have is that the bathroom door did not latch, which caused it to fall open while in the shower or on the toilet.
reviews.title: Ramada Christiana, DE Stay

reviews.text: When Dwayne P (Sales Manager) called my cell to tell me he could not honor my guaranteed reservation that was made a year ago but.....even though he made another reservation for me at another Hotel that his General Manager/owner owned at a Days Inn..way out of the way in Wilmington....it was not "Walking" and "he did not have to pay for it". Well thanks for the 6 days of notice...but I will pass on the Days Inn. Also instead of the $199 for the one night I was going to pay at he Ramada..he said I can have a room at the Days Inn in Wilmington at a cheaper rate of $169. (keep your $30 and honor my reservation!!) I went on line and they were offering rooms at $117. When I told Dwayne he said for me to go on line a reserve it. Dwayne is that how you treat your confirmed guests 6 days away from arrival? Who else did you move? You told me I was not the only one. Wow that made me feel better!!! I can't say "walk" because you are not paying for the move. Who else did this happen too???? Do not book at this hotel or the Wilmington Days Inn or this can happen to you!!
reviews.title: Shame on you Dwayne P. (sales manager)!!! & The owner !!! Guests Be Aware of their practices
Guaranteed Reservations do not matter here. They will walk you!
reviews.text: Made a guaranteed room reservation on 6/5/12 for one double room checking in 5/24/13 for one night. They just called today 5/17/13 to tell me they cannot honor that reservation they had a "glich" in the system...even though it was confirmed 6 months ago. They have rooms at their "other" hotel in Wilmington.. a Days Inn that I can stay at. That is how they treat their guests. HORRIBLE

description: A well-appointed hotel in Newark, DE, minutes from Wilmington, DE, with an attached Italian Restaurant for fine dining, a lively bar and lounge to unwind, a beautiful garden courtyard with an outdoor pool, banquet facilities for your next event, and the best high-speed wireless in the area.
